description: Numbers that are the sum of 3 positive cubes in exactly 1 way.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Cubic Number.
Index entries for sequences related to sums of cubes
mathematica: Reap[For[n = 1, n <= 500, n++, pr = Select[ PowersRepresentations[n, 3, 3], Times @@ # != 0 &]; If[pr != {} && Length[pr] == 1, Print[n, pr]; Sow[n]]]][[2, 1]] (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Jul 31 2013 *)
author: _David W. Wilson_
